tool_description: Scans account activity for policy violations using configurable detection rules and severity thresholds.

account_id.description: Account identifier to scan for violations

lookback_days.description: Number of days to look back for violations (1-365)

severity_threshold.description: Minimum severity to report: low, medium, high, critical

error_messages: Invalid lookback period: lookback_days must be between 1 and 365.
Unknown violation type: Use only supported violation types [fraud, abuse, payment, content, security, terms].
Invalid severity threshold: Use one of [low, medium, high, critical].
Scan timeout: Violation detection took too long. Try reducing lookback_days or limiting violation_types.
usage: Specify account_id and optionally filter by violation_types, lookback_days, and severity_threshold to focus the scan.

violation_summary.description: Brief description of key violations found
